repositories.author: vaimo
repositories.name: composer-patches
repositories.description: Applies a patch from a local or remote file to any package that is part of a given composer project. Patches can be defined both on project and on package level. Optional support for patch versioning, sequencing, custom patch applier configuration (global, per patch) and patch command for testing/troubleshooting added patches.
